node.html:
choerodon-ui strictly follows Semantic Versioning 2.0.0.

Release Schedule

  • Weekly release: patch version at the end of every week for routine bugfix (anytime for urgent bugfix).
  • Monthly release: minor version at the end of every month for new features.
  • Major version release is not included in this schedule for breaking change and new features.

There is a style problem when using some functions (inconsistent with the official website), you need to update the UED dependency package to the latest version reference document version dependency
